Articles.Content:
What. The.

I was trying to get a Kerbal back into a ship when I switched to the wrong thing (yes, that's the Mun North Pole)

When I tried to switch back, this happened.

Umm.

Ever notice how the vessel switching alerts really like to annoy you?
The poles tend to have wonky physics like that. So do the distant bodies, for that matter. Not much you can do about it, sadly.
Aww. It looks as if I'll have to reload and plant the flag again. Still, "cannot switch while about to crash"? I wasn't on a collision course yet, how did the game know about my secret plans?
